name: Litch
description: it is said that the Litch was once nothing more than a man like many others, able to feel compassion, joy and love. But that when his love died in his youth he devoted his whole life to the study and search for the resurrection of the dead, unfortunately the search was long and complex and the time of a man on this earth is limited so he decided to go to the lands to the north and steal the ancient magical skeleton of the dwarves in which he imprisoned his soul in order to continue his studies forever, one day, then, it is not known for what reason, the determination of the litch turned into madness and the doors of the depths were wide open letting out demon spirits, beasts and flies of all kinds, beginning the 200 years of terror that will be remembered as the age of the night. Currently the mere presence of the litch is sufficient to corrupt, deform and consume everything around him, moreover the power obtained from the partial completion of his research make him the only and most powerful necromancer on this plane of existence.
